name: Sigarda's Splendor
oracle_text:
As Sigarda's Splendor enters the battlefield, note your life total.
At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card if your life total is greater than or equal to the last noted life total for Sigarda's Splendor. Then note your life total.
Whenever you cast a white spell, you gain 1 life.

name: Soul-Guide Gryff
oracle_text:
Flying
When Soul-Guide Gryff enters the battlefield, exile up to one target card from a graveyard.
flavor_text: It conducts the souls of the righteous to their blessed rest and the spirits of the evil to justice.

name: Search Party Captain
oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature you attacked with this turn.
When Search Party Captain enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text: "Werewolves leave messy trails. Easy to follow. Hard to forget."

name: Homestead Courage
oracle_text:
Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It gains vigilance until end of turn.
Flashback {W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor_text: "C'mon, fiend. I'll carve you up like a Harvesttide ham."

name: Gavony Trapper
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor_text: The elite cathars of the Parish-Blades train in all manner of techniques designed to delay and frustrate the beasts that hunt the crossways.

name: Gavony Silversmith
oracle_text: When Gavony Silversmith enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.
flavor_text: More than heat and the strength of his arm, it was his faith that gave the blade its unyielding edge.

name: Curse of Silence
oracle_text:
Enchant player
As Curse of Silence enters the battlefield, choose a card name.
Spells with the chosen name enchanted player casts cost {2} more to cast.
Whenever enchanted player casts a spell with the chosen name, you may sacrifice Curse of Silence. If you do, draw a card.

name: Duelcraft Trainer
oracle_text:
First strike
Coven-At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control three or more creatures with different powers, target creature you control gains double strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: "It's all in the follow-through"

name: Clarion Cathars
oracle_text: When Clarion Cathars enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Human creature token.
flavor_text: The sound of the trumpet is both warning and comfort: it tells of approaching danger but also reminds the village folk that someone is there to stand against it.

name: Cathar's Call
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has vigilance and "At the beginning of your end step, create a 1/1 white Human creature token."
flavor_text: Some cathars succumbed to despair at Avacyn's unmaking. The rest redoubled their efforts to carry out her work.

name: Cathar Commando
oracle_text:
Flash
{1}, Sacrifice Cathar Commando: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: "Honorable tactics are for honorable foes. These werewolves are preying on innocent travelers. I'll stab them in the back while they sleep if I have to."

name: Path to the Festival
oracle_text:
Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Then if there are three or more basic land types among lands you control, scry 1. (Lok at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
Flashback {4}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Eccentric Farmer
oracle_text: When Eccentric Farmer enters the battlefield, mill three cards, then you may return a land card from your graveyard to your hand. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
flavor_text: "Careful now. Don't want to get the seeds stuck to your feelers like last time."

name: Blessed Defiance
oracle_text: Target creature you control gets +2/+0 and gains lifelink until end of turn. When that creature dies this turn, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
flavor_text: "If I'm going, I'm taking you with me!"

name: Curse of Shaken Faith
oracle_text:
Enchant player
Whenever enchanted player casts a spell other than the first spell they cast each turn or copies a spell, Curse of Shaken Faith deals 2 damage to them.

name: Storm the Festival
oracle_text:
Look at the top five cards of your library. Put up to two permanent cards with mana value 5 or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Flashback {7}{G}{G}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Triskaidekaphile
oracle_text:
You have no maximum hand size.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have exactly thirteen cards in your hand, you win the game.
{3}{U}: Draw a card.

Flying
Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Storm Skreelix gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

name: Plummet
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying.
flavor_text:
"A creature of stone was never meant to fly. And I see the Ulvenwald agrees with me."
—Halana, Kessig ranger

name: Lambholt Harrier
oracle_text: {3}{R}: Target creature can't block this turn.
flavor_text:
"This Tovolar is no brainless brute. He sends his howling minions to terrorize a village for months. Sleepless nights and fear take their toll. Only then, when morale is at its worst, does he strike."
—Barnes, village watch

card_faces.name: Outland Liberator
card_faces.oracle_text:
{1}, Sacrifice Outland Liberator: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)

{1}, Sacrifice Frenzied Trapbreaker: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
Whenever Frenzied Trapbreaker attacks, destroy target artifact or enchantment defending player controls.
Nightbound (If a player casts at least two spells during their own turn, it becomes day next turn.)

card_faces.name: Tireless Hauler
card_faces.oracle_text:
Vigilance
Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)
card_faces.flavor_text: Thew new hire proved more than enough to replace the three farmhands who disappeared the week before.

card_faces.name: Dire-Strain Brawler
card_faces.oracle_text:
Vigilance
Nightbound (If a player casts at least two spells during their own turn, it becomes day next turn.)
card_faces.flavor_text: A few townsfolk had their suspicions, but none dared accuse him openly.

Trample
Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)

Trample

name: Lord of the Forsaken
oracle_text:
Flying, trample
{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Target player mills three cards.
Pay 1 life: Add {C}. Spend this mana only to cast a spell from your graveyard.

name: Evolving Wilds
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text:
"Stensia blazes with new heat. Nephalia's tides are chaotic. And everywhere, this unnatural frost. The land is sending a warning."
—Katilda, Dawnhart Prime

name: Silver Bolt
oracle_text: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Silver Bolt: It deals 3 damage to target creature. If a Werewolf is dealt damage this way, destroy it.
flavor_text:
"When a werewolf charges, you'll only have time for one shot. Best make it count."
—Captain Eberheart

name: Crossroads Candleguide
oracle_text:
When Crossroads Candleguide enters the battlefield, exile up to one target card from a graveyard.
{2}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: Do the candleguides' heads turn to follow you as you pass, or is it merely a trick of the flickering light?

name: Timberland Guide
oracle_text: When Timberland Guide enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text: Hiring an experienced wilderness guide isn't cheap, but it costs less than a search party. Or a funeral.

name: Tapping at the Window
oracle_text:
Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.
Flashback {2}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Shadowbeast Sighting
oracle_text:
Create a 4/4 green Beast creature token.
Flashback {6}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor_text:
"Werewolves leave tracks. Vampires leave wrung-out corpses. This is something else."
—Paulin, trapper of Somberwald

card_faces.name: Harvesttide Infiltrator
card_faces.oracle_text:
Trample
Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)
card_faces.flavor_text: He was one masked stranger among many. Blending in was child's play.

card_faces.name: Harvesttide Assailant
card_faces.oracle_text:
Trample
Nightbound (If a player casts at least two spells during their own turn, it becomes day next turn.)
card_faces.flavor_text: When Tovolar's howl sounded from the woods, it was answered from the heart of the festival.

name: Return to Nature
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Exile target card from a graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Even steel and stone return to Ghrin-Danu in time."
—Katilda, Dawnhart Prime

name: Harvesttide Sentry
oracle_text: Coven — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control three or more creatures with different powers, Harvesttide Sentry can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less this turn.
flavor_text: She patrols the darkness so that others can forget their worries for one bright evening.

card_faces.name: Shady Traveler
card_faces.oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)
card_faces.flavor_text: The stranger spoke to no one, and the townspeople gladly returned the favor.

card_faces.name: Stalking Predator
card_faces.oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Nightbound (If a player casts at least two spells during their own turn, it becomes day next turn.)
card_faces.flavor_text: Tomorrow a new village, and new victims.

name: Bramble Armor
oracle_text:
When Bramble Armor enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature you control.
Equipped creature gets +2/+1.
Equip {4} ({4}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card_faces.name: Ecstatic Awakener
card_faces.oracle_text: {2}{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Draw a card, then transform Ecstatic Awakener. Activate only once each turn.
card_faces.flavor_text: "Great Ormendahl, I kneel before you, a fragment of your will, a servant of your tyrrany. I beg you, release the strength within me!"

card_faces.name: Awoken Demon
card_faces.flavor_text: Bones cracked, flesh split apart, and the screams of euphoric agony gave way to unholy laughter.

name: Bounding Wolf
oracle_text:
Flash
Reach
flavor_text: With their usual prey scared off by werewolves, the wolves of the Ulvenwald adopted inventive new hunting techniques.

card_faces.name: Galedrifter
card_faces.oracle_text:
Flying
Disturb {4}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard transformed for its disturb cost.)
card_faces.flavor_text:
"If you're lost in a storm, follow a gryff. They always know which way calmer waters lie."
—Geor, Havengul fisher

card_faces.name: Waildrifter
card_faces.oracle_text:
Flying
If Waildrifter would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
card_faces.flavor_text:
"Wait! That's no gryff—at least not anymore."
—Geor, Havengul fisher

name: Mourning Patrol // Morning Apparition
type_line: Creature — Human Soldier // Creature — Spirit Soldier

card_faces.name: Mourning Patrol
card_faces.oracle_text:
Vigilance
Disturb {3}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard transformed for its disturb cost.)
card_faces.flavor_text: "It's creepy out here, isn't it, boy? I always feel like someone's watching us."

card_faces.name: Morning Apparition
card_faces.oracle_text:
Flying, vigilance
If Morning Apparition would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
card_faces.flavor_text: "You could see the spirits all along, couldn't you? Well, now I can too."

Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

card_faces.flavor_text: "Even in our darkest times, Avacyn's light still guides us."

card_faces.name: Luminous Phantom
card_faces.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever another creature you control leaves the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
If Luminous Phantom would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

name: Ambitious Farmhand // Seasoned Cathar
type_line: Creature — Human Peasant // Creature — Human Knight

card_faces.name: Ambitious Farmhand
card_faces.oracle_text:
When Ambitious Farmhand enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Coven—{1}{W}{W}: Transform Ambitious Farmhand. Activate only if you control three or more creatures with different powers.

card_faces.name: Seasoned Cathar
card_faces.oracle_text: Lifelink
card_faces.flavor_text: "The cathars have taught me many things, but I will never forget the hard, honest work that first callused my hands."

name: Voldaren Stinger
oracle_text:
Voldaren Stinger has first strike as long as it's attacking.
{2}{R}: Voldaren Stinger gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: A duel to first blood means something very different when a vampire is involved.

name: Stolen Vitality
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn. If it's your turn, that creature gains trample until end of turn. Otherwise, it gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: "There's nothing like a good meal to really lift the spirit."

name: Raze the Effigy
oracle_text:
Choose one—
• Destroy target artifact.
• Target attacking creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The folk of Kessig build up their courage by burning effigies of the things they fear.

name: Pack's Betrayal
oracle_text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. If you control a Wolf or Werewolf, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
flavor_text: Tovolar's howl of command was too much to resist, even for Arlinn's own loyal pack.

name: Neonate's Rush
oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a Vampire.
Neonate's Rush deals 1 damage to target creature and 1 damage to its controller. Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"We spend our entire existence pursuing the joy of our first night's feast."
—Anje Falkenrath

name: Mounted Dreadknight
oracle_text:
Trample
Mounted Dreadknight enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if an opponent lost life this turn.
flavor_text: Markov vampires cultivate an image of such decadent elegance that it can be easy to forget they can field a deadly fighting force.

name: Moonrager's Slash
oracle_text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if it's night.
Moonrager's Slash deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: The cathars fell like leaves as Tovolar himself joined the fray.

name: Electric Revelation
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.
Flashback {3}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost and any additional costs. Then exile it.)

name: Burn the Accursed
oracle_text: Burn the Accused deals 5 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor_text: Nothing remained but a few drifting embers and the smell of smoldering hair.

name: Ardent Elementalist
oracle_text: When Ardent Elementalist enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: While the Dawnhart witches focus their magic on nature and community, other covens consort with devils and twist the elements to their will.

name: Abandon the Post
oracle_text:
Up to two target creatures can't block this turn.
Flashback {3}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor_text: You don't have to outrun the werewolf; you only have to outrun your fellow guard.

name: Vampire Interloper
oracle_text:
Flying
Vampire Interloper can't block.
flavor_text: The Voldaren have begun demanding blood offerings from the villagers in their territory. Their agents arrive from the sky to collect the ceremonial bowls in eerie silence.

name: Rotten Reunion
oracle_text:
Exile up to one target card from a graveyard. Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)
Flashback {1}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor_text: Aunt and Uncle Greyfield loved dinner guests.

name: Olivia's Midnight Ambush
oracle_text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. If it's night, that creature gets -13/-13 until end of turn instead.
flavor_text: "And you were almost finished with that ritual, wern't you, darling? How very rude of me. To make it up to you, I'll send you an invitatino to my wedding."

name: Novice Occultist
oracle_text: When Novice Occultist dies, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor_text: All across Gavony, in shuttered bedrooms and locked barns, young people seek the answers their elders failed to provide.

name: No Way Out
oracle_text: Target opponent discards two cards. You create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)
flavor_text: In the maze-like passages of the Erdwal, a wrong turn can be fatal.

name: Morkrut Behemoth
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or pay {1}{B}.
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor_text:
"Let's see my brother's stitched-up little toys compete with this."
—Ghoulcaller Gisa

name: Duress
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor_text: The Voldaren torture pits are so expansive that prisoners have a nasty tendency to be forgotten for years.

name: Crawl from the Cellar
oracle_text:
Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target Zombie you control.
Flashback {3}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Blood Pact
oracle_text: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.
flavor_text: Griselbrand's defeat did not mark the end of the Skirsdag cult. They simply turned their worship to the next demon to emerge from the shadows bearing offers of power.

name: Bat Whisperer
oracle_text: When Bat Whisperer enters the battlefield, if an opponent lost life this turn, create a 1/1 black Bat creature token with flying.
flavor_text: "My little winged friends tell me which of these townfolk are worth tasting for myself."

name: Unblinking Observer
oracle_text: {T}: Add {U}. Spend this mana only to pay a disturb cost or cast an instant or sorcery spell.
flavor_text:
"Day 77: The homunculus within the crystal continues to mimic my every movement. I wonder what they are writing?"
—Laboratory notes of Yzlkpk

name: Shipwreck Sifters
oracle_text:
When Shipwreck Sifters enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.
Whenever you discard a Spirit card or a card with disturb, put a +1/+1 counter on Shipwreck Sifters.
flavor_text: A loyal crew sticks together, even after death.

name: Revenge of the Drowned
oracle_text: Target creature's owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library. You create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)
flavor_text: A heavy net doesn't always mean a good catch.

name: Otherworldly Gaze
oracle_text:
Look at the top three cards of your library. Put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest back on top of your library in any order.
Flashback {1}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Geistwave
oracle_text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If you controlled that permanent, draw a card.
flavor_text: Necro-alchemists gained popular support during the Travails, when geist-fueled weapons helped defend towns against mad cultists and Eldrazi monstrosities.

name: Flip the Switch
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}. Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)
flavor_text:
"Works every time! Well, every time they don't explode, anyway."
—Barton, stitcher

name: Falcon Abomination
oracle_text:
Flying
When Falcon Abomination enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)
flavor_text: The foulest of fowl.

name: Drownyard Amalgam
oracle_text:
When Drownyard Amalgam enters the battlefield, target player mills three cards. (They put the top three cards of their library into their graveyard.)
{2}{U}: Drownyard Amalgam can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: When human corpses are in short supply, stitchers get creative.

name: Devious Cover-Up
oracle_text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard. You may shuffle up to four target cards from your graveyard into your library.
flavor_text: Widow Weber's new scarecrow seemed to attract more crows than it scared off.

name: Component Collector
oracle_text:
If it's neither day nor night, it becomes day as Component Collector enters the battlefield.
Whenever day becomes night or night becomes day, you may tap or untap target nonland permanent.
flavor_text: "Keep master busy with new bits or else maybe she wonders if I'm made of bits too."
